roleset.name: catastrophe
roleset.note: DISASTER-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT. comparison to 'crisis.01'. (from disaster.01-n)

example.name: State Of The Union
example.text: A horrible , divisive disaster of a SOTU which will haunt this one - term failure all the way up to Election Day .
example.arg: which will haunt this one - term failure all the way up to Election Day
